org.axiondb.engine
Class BaseArrayIndex

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.event.BaseTableModificationListener
        |
        +--org.axiondb.engine.BaseIndex
              |
              +--org.axiondb.engine.BaseArrayIndex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Index, TableModificationListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntArrayIndex, ObjectArrayIndex
public abstract class BaseArrayIndex
extends BaseIndex
implements Index

Abstract base implemenation for indices that maintain an in-memory, sorted array of key values (and their associated row identifiers). This type of index is fast to read, relatively slow to write and somewhat memory expensive when very large.

Version:
$Revision: 1.12 $ $Date: 2003/05/02 13:25:42 $
